languages.text: "Хм". {n}Девушка едва пожимает плечами. Она не выглядит удивленной, скорее разочарованной и... напуганной?{/n} "В таком случае мне не остается ничего, кроме как отправиться паковать вещи. Жаль, {name}, очень жаль. Прощайте".

"Hmm." {n}Jae barely shrugs. She does not look surprised, more disappointed... and frightened?{/n} "In that case, I have no choice but to go and start packing. It's too bad, {name}, it's really too bad. Farewell."
languages.original_text: "Хм". {n}Девушка едва пожимает плечами. Она не выглядит удивленной, скорее разочарованной и... напуганной?{/n} "В таком случае мне не остается ничего, кроме как отправиться паковать вещи. Жаль, {name}, очень жаль. Прощайте".

traits.locale_text: "Hm-m". {n}The young woman barely shrugs. She does not look surprised, more like disappointed... and frightened?{/n} "In this case I have no choice but to go and start packing things. Shame, {name}, this is a real shame. Farewell."

"Hm-m". {n}The young woman barely shrugs. She does not look surprised, more like disappointed... and frightened?{/n} "In this case I have no choice but to go and start packing things. Shame, {name}, this is a real shame. Farewell."

"Hmm." {n}The young woman barely shrugs. She does not look surprised, more disappointed... and frightened?{/n} "In that case, I have no choice but to go and start packing. It's too bad, {name}, it's really too bad. Farewell."

"Hmm." {n}The young woman barely shrugs. She does not look surprised, more disappointed... and frightened?{/n} "In that case, I have no choice but to go and start packing. It's too bad, {name}, it's really too bad. Farewell."

"Hmm." {n}Jae barely shrugs. She does not look surprised, more disappointed... and frightened?{/n} "In that case, I have no choice but to go and start packing. It's too bad, {name}, it's really too bad. Farewell."

languages.text: “嗯。”{n}婕伊勉强耸了耸肩。她看起来并不惊讶，更多的是失望……与恐惧？{/n}“既然如此，恐怕我别无选择，只能开始收拾东西了。这太糟糕了，{name}，真的太糟糕了。我们就此别过吧。”
languages.original_text: "Hmm." {n}Jae barely shrugs. She does not look surprised, more disappointed... and frightened?{/n} "In that case, I have no choice but to go and start packing. It's too bad, {name}, it's really too bad. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: “嗯。”{n}婕伊勉强耸了耸肩。她看起来并不惊讶，更多的是失望……与恐惧？{/n}“既然如此，恐怕我别无选择，只能开始收拾东西了。这太糟糕了，{name}，真的太糟糕了。我们就此别过吧。”

languages.original_text: "Hmm." {n}Jae barely shrugs. She does not look surprised, more disappointed... and frightened?{/n} "In that case, I have no choice but to go and start packing. It's too bad, , it's really too bad. Farewell."

languages.text: «Mmm». {n}Jae apenas se encoge de hombros. No parece sorprendida, sino decepcionada... ¿y asustada?{/n} «En ese caso, no me queda más remedio que empezar a recoger para irme. Es una lástima, {name}, de verdad. Adiós».
languages.original_text: "Hmm." {n}Jae barely shrugs. She does not look surprised, more disappointed... and frightened?{/n} "In that case, I have no choice but to go and start packing. It's too bad, {name}, it's really too bad. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: «Mmm». {n}Jae apenas se encoge de hombros. No parece sorprendida, sino decepcionada... ¿y asustada?{/n} «En ese caso, no me queda más remedio que empezar a recoger para irme. Es una lástima, {name}, de verdad. Adiós».

languages.text: 「うーん…」{n}ジェイはかろうじて肩をすくめた。彼女は驚いているようには見えず、むしろ失望…そして怯えが感じ取られるような気がした{/n}「それなら、荷造りを始めるしかないね。残念だよ、{name}。本当に残念だ。じゃあね」
languages.original_text: "Hmm." {n}Jae barely shrugs. She does not look surprised, more disappointed... and frightened?{/n} "In that case, I have no choice but to go and start packing. It's too bad, {name}, it's really too bad. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: 「うーん…」{n}ジェイはかろうじて肩をすくめた。彼女は驚いているようには見えず、むしろ失望…そして怯えが感じ取られるような気がした{/n}「それなら、荷造りを始めるしかないね。残念だよ、{name}。本当に残念だ。じゃあね」

languages.text: "Hmm." {n}Jae zuckt kaum mit den Schultern. Sie sieht nicht überrascht aus, eher enttäuscht ... und verängstigt?{/n} "Dann bleibt mir wohl nur noch, mit dem Packen zu beginnen. Zu schade, {name}, wirklich zu schaden. Lebt wohl."
languages.original_text: "Hmm." {n}Jae barely shrugs. She does not look surprised, more disappointed... and frightened?{/n} "In that case, I have no choice but to go and start packing. It's too bad, {name}, it's really too bad. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: "Hmm." {n}Jae zuckt kaum mit den Schultern. Sie sieht nicht überrascht aus, eher enttäuscht ... und verängstigt?{/n} "Dann bleibt mir wohl nur noch, mit dem Packen zu beginnen. Zu schade, {name}, wirklich zu schaden. Lebt wohl."

languages.text: « Hmm. » {n}Jae hausse les épaules presque imperceptiblement. Elle ne semble pas surprise, mais plutôt déçue... et effrayée ?{/n} « Dans ce cas, il ne me reste plus qu'à faire mes valises. C'est dommage, {name}, vraiment dommage. Adieu. »
languages.original_text: "Hmm." {n}Jae barely shrugs. She does not look surprised, more disappointed... and frightened?{/n} "In that case, I have no choice but to go and start packing. It's too bad, {name}, it's really too bad. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: « Hmm. » {n}Jae hausse les épaules presque imperceptiblement. Elle ne semble pas surprise, mais plutôt déçue... et effrayée ?{/n} « Dans ce cas, il ne me reste plus qu'à faire mes valises. C'est dommage, {name}, vraiment dommage. Adieu. »

languages.text: "Hımm." {n}Jae çok hafif omuz silkiyor. Şaşırmıştan çok düş kırıklığına uğramış, biraz da korkmuşa benziyor.{/n} "Bu durumda gidip eşyalarımı toplamaktan başka seçeneğim yok. Çok yazık {name}, gerçekten çok yazık oldu. Hoşça kal."
languages.original_text: "Hmm." {n}Jae barely shrugs. She does not look surprised, more disappointed... and frightened?{/n} "In that case, I have no choice but to go and start packing. It's too bad, {name}, it's really too bad. Farewell."

traits.locale_text: "Hımm." {n}Jae çok hafif omuz silkiyor. Şaşırmışa benzemiyor, daha çok hayal kırıklığına uğramış ve sanki biraz da... Korkmuş gibi?{/n} "Bu durumda gidip eşyalarımı toplamaktan başka seçeneğim yok. Çok yazık oldu {name}, gerçekten çok yazık oldu. Hoşça kal."
